intro: We're excited to have you join us! Here’s what you can do:

features.createPlans: Create personalized training plans tailored to your goals.
features.accessPreMade: Access ready-made training plans available for purchase.
features.aiPlans: Use AI to generate a personalized training plan in minutes.
features.findTrainer: Find and connect with a trainer who will create the perfect plan for you.

profileEncouragement: To fully utilize the app, complete your profile. This will help AI and trainers better understand your needs and create more tailored plans.
trainerIntro: We're excited to have you join our community of trainers! TrainifyHub is the place to efficiently manage your work and support your trainees in achieving their goals. Here’s what you can do:

trainerFeatures.createAssignPlans: Create and assign training plans to your trainees.
trainerFeatures.trackProgress: Track your trainees' progress and receive notifications when they complete a week or a full plan.
trainerFeatures.communicate: Communicate with trainees via the built-in chat.
trainerFeatures.addExercises: Add your own exercises to the database if something is missing.
trainerFeatures.setPayments: Decide how users pay for your plans – TrainifyHub gives you full control.
trainerFeatures.publicProfile: Make your profile public so users can find you.

trainerEncouragement: To fully leverage TrainifyHub and attract more trainees, complete your profile. This will help users understand your training approach and choose you as their trainer.
